sentences.sContent: The 4% pay raise was the result of some hard bargaining .
sentences.sCn: 4%的加薪是经过一番艰苦谈判后才取得的结果。

sentences.sContent: They prefer to bargain with individual clients, for cash.
sentences.sCn: 他们更愿意同个人客户洽谈，做现金交易。

phrases.pCn: 劳资双方代表进行的谈判
谈判的筹码；讨价还价的筹码

words.tran: 交易者；买卖约定者；讨价还价的人

trans.tranOther: discussion in order to reach an agreement about a sale, contract etc
When people bargain with each other, they discuss what each of them will do, pay, or receive
